ModMetaData.name: Kurin Meow Edition
ModMetaData.author: EoralMilk
ModMetaData.description:
Kurin Meow Edition: A classic Kurin race remastered mod. Kurin喵喵版:一个经典魅狐种族的重制版。
Please set the setting "Randomize Starting Pawns on Reroll" of HAR framework as false 请将HAR框架的 "Randomize Starting Pawns on Reroll" 设置改为关闭状态
Using har and FaceAddonFramework's Kurin remaster, the original Kurin content is restored as much as possible. 使用HAR和FaceAddonFramework框架的Kurin重置版，原始的Kurin mod内容被尽可能地恢复。
Compatibility: Vanilla Expanded Framework: The "kurin marine riot shield" will be added if you have VEF. Save Our Ship2: we add the space suit for kurin. Multiplayer: Totally support 兼容性： Vanilla Expanded Framework: 如果你装了VEF，将会添加“魅狐防暴盾牌”。 Save Our Ship2：我们为狐狸制作了宇航服等装备。 Multiplayer: 完全支持
